text: @realDonaldTrump And you’re going to monitor clusters by zipcode? What if I live in midtown and that zone is high for positives and work in Queens?  EVERY SINGLE PERSON SHOULD BE TESTED Before you set it up that unwittingly people contaminate others and so on and so on and so on.#COVID19
